Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
45 SOUL EATER STACKS 225% increased cast speed
(So the Despair from the Merc works) You Can apply an additional Curse
40% increased global defences 10% reduced Attributes
(Merc Zealotry) 16% More Spell Damage
